# PATHFIND::ADD_NAVMESH_REQUIRED_REGION

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** x: TRA NOTES: This can use up game memory very rapidly - use with caution!  Be sure to remove the area when no longer required.
* **FLOAT** y: One region may be defined at a time, to avoid excessive memory usage
* **FLOAT** radius: ' as small as possible, because all navmeshes intersecting this area will be loaded

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Defined the scripted optional scripted region which will have navmesh loaded at all times
